It looks like **[Antique Olive (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020212443/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Antique%20Olive%20Std%20-%20Bold&fid=6e55410d1c109d45c910e5a300edf67e&fsize=60&text=special%20...mmm&wrap=2)** by Roger Excoffon, available from URW++, Linotype or Adobe
